com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender

Class BaseRecyclerAdapter<E extends io.realm.RealmObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BaseRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender.BaseRecyclerAdapter<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountsAdapter, CategoriesAdapter, RecurringAdapter, TransactionsAdapter

    public abstract class BaseRecyclerAdapter<E extends io.realm.RealmObject>
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BaseRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder>
    Base class for Recycler View Adapters which provides storage of dataSet that is used and means to update it. It also observes its ViewHolders to notify them to hide their expanded buttons when another ViewHolder has them opened. Subclasses need only implement the onBindViewHolder method to return the concrete ViewHolder they are using.
    Author:
    Boyan Stoynov

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BaseRecyclerAdapter.RecyclerViewListener<E extends io.realm.RealmObject>
      Interface that must be implemented by controllers that want to be notified whenever the Delete or Edit buttons has been clicked on one of the ViewHolders.
      static class  BaseRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder<E extends io.realm.RealmObject>
      Base ViewHolder inner static class which stores the item that populates it and binds ButterKnife.
